name: Dolphin Rescue
description:
Competition entry for 48-hour competition Ludum Dare 28. Theme: "You Only Get One", 13-14 December 2013.

This is a 2d WebGL game, and my first Ludum Dare game in this format - I later did "Mountain Rescue" for LD29. The game ranked no. 420 and did pretty well for humour.

The game is a remake/re-imagining of Atari 2600 game "Seaquest" (http://youtu.be/ZeRGJk7HQGc) except with a dolphin instead of a submarine. The idea is to rescue the sailors from the sharks and put them in the boat.
